summary: This document is an email exchange from March 2024 discussing a victim's recruitment and sex trafficking in 2002-2003. The victim describes being recruited under false pretenses of a modeling contract in Cape Town, South Africa, and mentions the presence of Ghislaine Maxwell and Bill Clinton during a "casting" event.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as being present in Paris in 2003 during the victim's trafficking, and inquired about in relation to the initial 2002 recruitment event in Cape Town.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.context: Witnessed the "casting" event during the victim's recruitment in Cape Town on September 26, 2002.

connections.description: Both were present during events related to the victim's recruitment and trafficking in 2002-2003, as described in the victim's account.

events.title: Modeling Recruitment "Casting" in Cape Town
events.description: A victim was recruited under false pretenses of a modeling contract at the Cape Grace Hotel. Bill Clinton witnessed the "casting".

events.title: Victim Taken to Paris
events.description: The victim was taken to Paris where they saw many models and Ghislaine Maxwell was present.

keyFacts: A victim alleges being recruited and sex trafficked under false pretenses of a modeling contract with Victoria's Secret in 2002.
The initial recruitment "casting" occurred on September 26, 2002, at the Cape Grace Hotel in Cape Town, South Africa.
Bill Clinton is alleged to have witnessed this 2002 "casting" event.
The victim was subsequently taken to Paris in 2003, where Ghislaine Maxwell was present.
The correspondence is a 2024 email exchange where a survivor is being asked to confirm details of their trafficking.
